UpdateLog.description:
[title]Recent News[/title][font]Small[/font]
[title]Balance Changes[/title][font]Small[/font] [b]Tank (Vehicle)[/b] - Increased RepairRate from 1.5 to 2.5 - Decreased MoveSpeed from 3.75 to 3.25
[b]Car (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased RepairRate from 650 to 3.25
[b]Rowboat (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased RepairRate from 650 to 5
[b]Fishing Boat (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased RepairRate from 650 to 4.25
[b]Sparrow (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased RepairRate from 650 to 1.75
[b]Hot Air Balloon (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased RepairRate from 650 to 4.5
[b] Advanced Transport Pod (Buildable)[/b] - Decreased MaxHitPoints from 5000 to 450 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 45000 - Changed CostList from 35 ComponentIndustrial + 3000 Steel to 12 ComponentIndustrial + 4 ComponentSpacer + 450 Steel + 75 Plasteel
[b]Advanced Transport Pod (Vehicle)[/b] - Decreased RepairRate from 650 to 3.25
[title]Bug Fixes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Fixed bug where vehicles would continue to path to their destination even after roles are no longer fulfilled (pawn dies while driving)
- Fixed bug where vehicle turrets continue to fire even after roles are no longer fulfilled (same as above)
[title]Additional Changes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Reworked health mechanics of Vehicles to use similar (but stripped down) version of StatModifiers, StatParts, and StatDefs. This will allow defining of new stats with less effort, as well as allowing other modders to create StatParts to modify the final value.
[title]Final Notes[/title][font]Small[/font] Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.) or on the discord server.
